actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Select Committee on Intelligence (without written report).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 95-257.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: An original resolution reported authorizing additional expenditures by the Select Committee on Intelligence.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 95-257) Authorizes the Senate Select Committee on Intelligence to make expenditures, not to exceed $1,150,000 from the contingent fund of the Senate to carry out its prescribed duties.

titles.title: An original resolution reported authorizing additional expenditures by the Select Committee on Intelligence.
